derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, diminutive of helme, of Germanic origin; related to helm

entry.def: A helmet is a hat made of a strong material which you wear to protect your head.

means.word_mean: 1. armor plate that protects the head
2. a protective headgear made of hard material to resist blows
